page.title: 06PASTIMES IN LANGPORT
page.content: We are 7 and 8 years old and this is what our friends like to do in Langport during the evenings and at weekends. All children like to play indoors or out-of-doors with toys and friends. There are also organised clubs for boys and girls. Boys: Cubs, Beavers (like Cubs but for younger children), B.M.X. Club (training on a bicycle for a display team) and Saturday sports club. Girls: ballet, Brownies (similar to Cubs but for girls) and gymnastics. Both: judo, Sunday School, Thursday Club, Youth Club and swimming at the Comprehensive School during the summer. Several children also attend the nearest public swimming pool (at Street, 15 miles away) for coaching throughout the year.
